long_description: Small enough to stash in a car trunk or a drawer, the REI Emergency Go Bag includes recommended supplies for 1 person for up to 5 days. Contains more than 15 different items; grab-and-go bag has multiple handles and includes the following key supplies:. Drinking-water packets and high-calorie food bars. A separate first-aid kit and respirator mask. Gloves, whistle, light sticks and sanitation supplies. The REI Emergency Go Bag also comes with a rescue blanket, tube tent and poncho.
short_description: Small enough to stash in a car trunk or a drawer, the REI Emergency Go Bag includes recommended supplies for 1 person for up to 5 days.
